Changelog
=========

1.2 - 2009-08-20
----------------

* Disable FromClause.default_order_by in 0.4; 0.5 removes this functionality
  altogether, it's not needed, and interferes with the quoting of rowid on
  Oracle.

1.1 - 2009-08-12
----------------

* Add the improved LIMIT/OFFSET handling from 0.6.

1.0 - 2009-08-05
----------------

* Initial release
